title: Similar to Edwardian Script
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101073635im_/http:/typophile.com/files/reflections_5733.jpg)

It's very similar to Edwardian Script, but not quite Edwardian script - any help would be greatly appreciated.
author: rapidz

comments.content: May be [Bickham Script AT](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101073635/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/bickham-script-mm) using some stylisting alternates. See also [Champion Script PF](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101073635/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/parachute/pf-champion-script-pro) too.
Hi Ryuk, thanks for such a quick response. I've checked both out, but they don't seem to be spot on. Nevertheless - really appreciate the help.
